default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: H-hi there... Minos Chief... Um, I... I'm the notorious cyclops of Eastside! ...No one would bully me if they hear this, right...?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: My power got stronger? ...Sigh.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I'll try my best... to accept this power, and become... someone who can control it.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Sigh... If only there were no battles.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: A surprising victory...

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: How... how scary... I-I'm really bad at fighting... I'm sorry... I'm sorry!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Don't look at me... Stay away from me!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I don't... want to... experience it again!

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Huh...? Are there Eastsiders here, too?... They won't do anything out of line... right, Chief?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: It's filthy inside the sewers... but also very safe. There, I won't get chased by the FAC or bullied by others... That's why... I just stayed there and didn't come out...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: There's a lot of weird people here, but... everyone treats me well! No one shuns me because of my background, and no one complains about my smell... Some are even eager to model for my photos. It's really a novel experience...

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: The world is so much clearer and prettier without my helmet... Thank you so much for giving me the courage to accept and control my power... I... I won't run away anymore! But... can I rely on you a bit more? I'm still not that great at fighting...

default.title: Level Up
default.text: I'm fine the way I am! I... I don't need to get any stronger...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Um... These are all... photos that I took before... but I'm not great at taking photos of people. Huh? You want to take photos, too, Chief? ...I-I will try my best!

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Ch-chief... That was from before, when I was really nervous... I couldn't help but dig a hole in the room... I was thinking I could hide in it or something...

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Will Mommy and Daddy come to find me... I... I shouldn't think about it. I'll only cause them trouble...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Chief... I made some crafts today to give them to you. I hope you can be in a good mood all day...

default.title: Idle
default.text: Hehe... I captured another amazing scene! Look, Chief... Ahh... Sorry... I'm a bit too excited...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Hey... ahhh! That... that... helmet is very dirty...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: It's... not a dangerous mission, is it? ...No fighting involved, right?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Ah... Thank goodness everything turned out fine...

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Um... right! Please don't... keep staring at me like that... It's making me nervous...

default.title: Deploy
default.text: There must be a better way to solve this than fighting, right?

skittish_star.title: Level Up
skittish_star.text: Hehehe... I'm getting better at this.

skittish_star.title: Obtain the Sinner
skittish_star.text: Ah! Chief... I-I'm fine. I just... accidentally got entangled in the wires and fell down...

skittish_star.title: Greeting
skittish_star.text: Chief, you... want to hear me play it right now? But... I'm not, not ready yet... P-please, can you wait for the official performance? I'm still not good enough... I need to practice more!

skittish_star.title: Ordinary Contact 1
skittish_star.text: Can I... really do well on stage? Back in school, I used to watch the bands shine on stage, and I always thought they were so cool... Do you think... I could be like that too?

skittish_star.title: Ordinary Contact 2
skittish_star.text: ...My costumes for the performance are cute? Thank you! I made all the decorations myself by referring to comic books. I look quite like an idol in it, right? Hehehe ...

skittish_star.title: Idle
skittish_star.text: This guitar case is so fluffy... I think... it fits me just right... It feels like cuddling... so comfy... Zzz...

skittish_star.title: Annoyed
skittish_star.text: S-sorry! Could you please free me from this? ...Ah..! It's getting tighter...

skittish_star.title: Special Attention
skittish_star.text: Ahhh... Please don't stare at me like that. I want to... wear my helmet again...
